thread.title: Doha Amendment to the Kyoto Protocol
thread.title_full: Doha Amendment to the Kyoto Protocol

title: Doha Amendment to the Kyoto Protocol
text:
Doha Amendment to the Kyoto Protocol Friday, 16 October 2015, 10:43 am Press Release: Office of the Clerk 
International treaty examination of the Doha Amendment to the Kyoto Protocol 
Public submissions are being invited on this treaty. The closing date for submissions is Friday 30 October 2015 . 
The Doha Amendment to the Kyoto Protocol was adopted in 2012 and establishes the Kyoto Protocolâ€™s second commitment period from 2013 until 2020. 
The text of the treaty and the National Interest Analysis are available on the Parliament website. 
Submissions should be forwarded by the due date, either online using our website (www.parliament.nz) or in writing to the address below. If a submitter wishes to appear before the committee, they need to state this clearly and provide a name, daytime phone number and email address. Submissions generally become public and are published on our website. For further guidance on making a submission, read our publication Making a submission to a Parliamentary Select Committee on our website or contact us at 04 817 9520. 
Address for correspondence: Foreign Affairs, Defence and Trade Committee, Parliament Buildings, WELLINGTON 6160. 
ENDS
